overview: t’s the tour loved from coast to coast, now coming directly to your living room!  Winter Jam On-Demand makes its big debut on April 9th with performances by Skillet, Tauren Wells, KB, Colton Dixon, I AM THEY, Newsong, Kevin Quinn, Zane Black, Abby Robertson, Bayside Worship, and Megan Duke.  If you missed this year’s tour or if you just want to see the show again, gather up your friends and family for an incredible night of music.  We even have group options if you’d like to host a viewing party at your church!  The on-demand concert will debut on April 9th at 6:00pm CT.
title: Winter Jam 2022 Virtual Watch Party
